thread.title: BRIEF-Smurfit Kappa Rejects Revised Proposal From International Paper

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Smurfit Kappa Rejects Revised Proposal From International Paper

organizations.name: brief-smurfit kappa rejects revised proposal from international paper  smurfit kappa group plc

text: March 26, 2018 / 6:35 AM / Updated 6 minutes ago BRIEF-Smurfit Kappa Rejects Revised Proposal From International Paper Reuters Staff March 26 (Reuters) - Smurfit Kappa Group Plc: * REG-SMURFIT KAPPA GROUP PLC STATEMENT RE REJECTION OF REVISED PROPOSAL FROM INTERNATIONAL PAPER * RECEIVED REVISED PROPOSAL FROM INTERNATIONAL PAPER COMPANY (“INTERNATIONAL PAPER”) ON THURSDAY EVENING, 22 MARCH 2018 * UNDER REVISED PROPOSAL, CO SHAREHOLDERS TO RECEIVE EUR 25.25 IN CASH, 0.3028 NEW SHARES OF IP STOCK FOR EACH CO SHARE * REVISED PROPOSAL WOULD VALUE EACH SMURFIT KAPPA SHARE AT EUR 37.54, REDUCED TO EUR 36.90 WHEN FINAL DIVIDEND IS EXCLUDED * BOARD HAS UNANIMOUSLY REJECTED REVISED PROPOSAL * “REVISED PROPOSAL ALSO FUNDAMENTALLY UNDERVALUES GROUP AND REMAINS SIGNIFICANTLY BELOW VALUATIONS SET BY RECENT INDUSTRY TRANSACTIONS” Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
